Generation VI.X: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
Generation VI.Y: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

Generation VIII.Sword: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
Generation VIII.Shield: If the two don't work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won't survive.

Generation VI.X: Routes 8 and 12 , Ambrette Town , Azure Bay ( Rock Smash )
Generation VI.Y: Routes 8 and 12 , Ambrette Town , Cyllage City , Azure Bay ( Rock Smash )
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Mirage Islands (south of Pacifidlog Town , south of Route 134 ; both by Rock Smash )
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Mirage Islands (south of Pacifidlog Town , south of Route 134 ; both by Rock Smash )

Generation VIII.Sword: Galar Mine No. 2 , Motostoke Riverbank , Bridge Field Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Giant's Seat , North Lake Miloch , Rolling Fields , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness , West Lake Axewell ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Galar Mine No. 2 , Motostoke Riverbank , Bridge Field Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Giant's Seat , North Lake Miloch , Rolling Fields , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness , West Lake Axewell ( Max Raid Battle )
